about_the_game:
Stop the invasion on the pool table!

A mysterious infestation has taken over the pool tables! Unidentified, ball-shaped and seemingly annoyed creatures are multiplying uncontrollably when touched, leaving colorful splash marks on our precious tables. No one knows where these invaders come from, or what is their goal, but one thing is certain: the only way to stop them is by playing the pool masterfully. 

SplitPool is an arcade game that brings a fresh twist on the classic game of pool. Each time you hit a ball and don't pocket it, it spawns another one—raising the stakes and making every shot count. Precision and strategic thinking are your best allies as you aim to prevent the table from overflowing.

Key Features:

  • Unique Gameplay Mechanics - Missed shots lead to balls splitting. To add "insult to injury", when splitting, the balls will leave a colorful splash on the otherwise pristine tablecloth.

  • Colorful Graphics and Satisfying Effects - Enjoy a game bursting with bright colors and cool effects that make every shot and splash feel awesome.

  • Challenging Table Designs - Multiple table designs and pocket placement provide an additional challenge.

  • Ugly Carpet Designs - Play on tables placed on some less-than-stylish carpets.

  • Special Items - Increase your chance of winning by using special items. Freeze balls to stop them from splitting, or use an Ice Pick to pop them—though it might leave a splash mark! 

  • Multiple Levels and Unlockable Achievements - Conquer numerous challenging levels and unlock achievements as you progress.

Now grab your cue and save the pool tables around the world!
